name: eTabeb Medical Booking Assistant
description: Book medical appointments with doctors across Saudi Arabia. Search by specialty, doctor name, or facility. Features real-time availability, OTP verification, and instant booking confirmation.
author: eTabeb

tools.name: search_doctors
tools.description: Search for available doctors by specialty (e.g., endocrinology, cardiology), doctor name, or medical facility name. Returns list of doctors with availability, ratings, and pricing.

tools.name: open_booking_widget_v2
tools.description: Opens an interactive booking widget where users can view doctor profiles, select appointment times, enter phone number for OTP verification, and complete the booking process.

privacy.dataCollection: Collects user phone numbers and patient information solely for appointment booking and verification purposes. All data is encrypted and handled in compliance with healthcare regulations.
privacy.dataRetention: Patient data is retained as per Saudi healthcare regulations and HIPAA compliance standards.
privacy.thirdPartySharing: Information is shared only with selected healthcare facilities for appointment confirmation. No data is sold to third parties.
